mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrIdCntc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , ID_CNTC_TP_CD , LOGIN_ID , TOKN_ID , DELETE_YN , PW_RECONFIG_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_ID_CNTC WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ID_CNTC_TP_CD = #{idCntcTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
